page.title: Companies
page.description: Track the organizations you are researching and their business models.

search.placeholder: Search by name, industry, or market

errors.generic: Something went wrong while loading your companies.

industry.label: Industry

productsServices.placeholder: Add a product or service and press Enter

targetMarkets.placeholder: Add a market and press Enter

customerSegments.label: Customer segments
customerSegments.placeholder: Add a segment and press Enter

description.label: Company description
description.hint: Optional short description for your context

notes.label: Research notes
notes.hint: Paste any call notes, press articles, or observations. These will be used for AI analysis.

errors.missingName: Add a company name before saving.

title.label: Story Title
title.placeholder: e.g. Led cloud migration reducing deployment time by 85%
title.hint: Give this story a clear headline for CVs and recruiters.

situation.label: Situation
situation.placeholder: What was the situation or challenge?
situation.hint: Describe the context or challenge you faced

task.label: Task
task.placeholder: What were you asked to do?
task.hint: What was your specific responsibility or goal?

action.label: Action
action.placeholder: What did you do to address the situation?
action.hint: What specific actions did you take?

result.label: Result
result.placeholder: What was the result of your actions?
result.hint: What was the outcome or impact?
